title: Should we reset the t3rm.dev mint fee to 0.1Eth?
body:
When we first launched t3rm.dev, the pricing mechanism on launch day was flooded with requests to mint, causing the final set price to be very expensive due to many users aping in. Right now, it's 4.45Eth per registration.

Although the price can de-escalate by 5% at each mint with 24h deltas, we might be above the threshold where that can happen naturally.

This is a proposal to reset the price back to the initial launch value of 0.1Eth using the administrative override, then allow the community to rediscover the ideal price point for t3rm.dev packages.

If the community wishes to respect the current set price for collectors / rarity reasons, we will respect that decision. We will only do this action once.
choices: No - Do NOT touch the mint fee
author: 0x3d3d3d7bBE26Cce6c143A8d72503B211BA80B753
